Amalgamated Bank 
We have established an Information Security Awareness Program for 
both Bank employees — to ensure they are aware of their obligations 
to enforce and adhere to policies and procedures designed to protect 
sensitive information about Amalgamated Bank and its customers — 
and for customers — to enhance delivery of information to customers 
that they can use to protect themselves from becoming victims of 
identity theft, and get help if their personal information has been 
compromised. Our Chief Information Security Officer is responsible for 
the oversight, training, compliance and implementation of this program.
